channel.title: CVE Feed for Flector -- RSS for Yandex Turbo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flector -- RSS for Yandex Turbo

item.title: CVE-2021-24277|2024-08-03T19:28:22.658Z -- flector -- rss%20for%20yandex%20turbo
item.description: The RSS for Yandex Turbo WordPress plugin before 1.30 did not properly sanitise the user inputs from its Счетчики settings tab before outputting them back in the page, leading to authenticated stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
